strategy: Questoris Mechanicus armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. All Knight formations are subject to the 'Bravery' special rule
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Questoris Mechanicus of the Adeptus Mechancius

formations.name: Questoris
formations.units: Two Questoris Knights (may not mix configurations)

sections.name: Support Banners
sections.description: Up to one Dominus or Cerastus Lance for each Core Lance.

formations.name: Cerastus
formations.units: Two Cerastus Knights (may not mix configurations)

sections.name: Recon Banners
sections.description: Up to one Recon Lance for each Core or Support Lance

sections.name: Relic Banners
sections.description: Up to one Relic Lance for each part of 1500 points in the army.

formations.name: Questoris Reliquae
formations.units: One Seneschal, one Questoris Relic Knight

formations.name: Acastus Reliquae
formations.units: One Seneschal, one Knight-Porphyrion or Knight-Asterius

sections.name: Mechanicus Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Forge World allies.

formations.name: Vanguard Maniple
formations.units: One Magos, nine Skitarii Vanguards, Gorgon
extraUnits: Replace the Gorgon with five Skorpius Duneriders: 25 points

formations.name: Onager Cataphractii
formations.units: Two Onager Dunecrawlers with Icarus Array, four Onager Dunecrawlers with another single configuration

upgrades.title: Questoris Mechanicus Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace one Seneschal in the army with a Baron
Add one Seneschal to the formation
